allWebshops: All ItsMyCargo webshops use Cookies to help make our services better.
reasonsForCookiesHead: Though we do not use cookies to track your movements   through out the web
reasonsForCookiesTail: we do need to save some information about your profile and the data you are accessing in the browser.
infoIsVital: This information is vital to the functioning of the site.
useDiscontinuedHead: As such if you decide to withdraw your consent to the use of cookies you will not be able
useDiscontinuedTail: to continue using the shop and we will have to close the window.
useContinued: Should you wish to resume using one of the ItsMyCargo Shops you will need to consent to the use of cookies again
